tool_description: Searches internal knowledge base for relevant articles, FAQs, and solutions based on customer intent and query context.

customer_tier.description: Customer tier to filter appropriate content

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

error_messages: Empty query: Search query cannot be empty
No results found: No relevant knowledge base articles found
Invalid max_results: Must be between 1 and 20
Search service unavailable: Knowledge base temporarily inaccessible
usage: Provide query and optionally intent_category, customer_tier, max_results, and include_metadata. Returns ranked relevant articles.

articles.description: List of relevant article titles and summaries

total_results.description: Total number of matching articles found
